channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK using more wood to make electricity than ever, Drax figures show
item.description: Giant biomass plant reveals burning of wood pellets made 9% of UK’s electricity in July, its largest ever monthly share Britain’s reliance on burning ...

item.title: Tory-Reform election pact would be ‘alliance of austerity and failure’, says Starmer – UK politics live
item.description: PM responds to report that Nigel Farage told donors he expects Reform could do an election deal with the Conservatives This is from Ed Davey , the Lib...

item.title: Labour planned in opposition how to introduce assisted dying via private member’s bill
item.description: Leaked document raises questions over amount of government control behind MP Kim Leadbeater’s bill UK politics live – latest updates Labour planned wh...

item.title: Nato ‘ready to do what it takes’ to protect Europe, as Russia denies rejecting Ukraine peace plan – Europe live
item.description: Mark Rutte’s response comes after Vladimir Putin’s comment that Russia was ‘ready’ for war with Europe European Commission president Ursula von der Le...

item.title: Trump’s homeland security department announces New Orleans immigration operation – live
item.description: DHS says it will target ‘criminal illegal aliens roaming free thanks to sanctuary policies’ as it announces action in latest Democratic-run city The D...

item.title: Children hurt as school bus roof ripped off by bridge
item.description: Among the injured is a boy, 8, who has been taken to hospital with a "non-serious" head injury.

item.title: King Charles welcomes German president on first state visit in 27 years
item.description: Germany's president will receive a ceremonial welcome from the King and a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

item.title: Salford Red Devils wound up by High Court over debts
item.description: Troubled former Super League club Salford Red Devils are wound up by the High Court.

item.title: What latest Ukraine talks reveal about Putin's state of mind
item.description: Russia's president looks determined to continue his war in Ukraine - even as the country's economic problems grow.

item.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
